description: User asks a general knowledge question - no tools needed

aiResponse.content:
React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications. It was developed and is maintained by Facebook (now Meta).

Key features:
- Component-based architecture
- Virtual DOM for efficient updates
- Declarative syntax with JSX
- Unidirectional data flow
- Rich ecosystem and community

React is one of the most popular frontend frameworks, alongside Vue and Angular.
